commits.author: Grant Ingersoll
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Sets the collator used to determine index term inclusion in ranges * specified either for ConstantScoreRangeQuerys or RangeQuerys (if * {@link #setUseOldRangeQuery(boolean)} is called with a true * value.) *

* WARNING: Setting the rangeCollator to a non-null * collator using this method will cause every single index Term in the * Field referenced by lowerTerm and/or upperTerm to be examined. * Depending on the number of index Terms in this Field, the operation could * be very slow. * * @param rc the collator to use when constructing RangeQuerys * and ConstantScoreRangeQuerys */ public void setRangeCollator(Collator rc) { rangeCollator = rc; }

commits.author: Michael McCandless
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Sets the collator used to determine index term inclusion in ranges * for RangeQuerys. *

* WARNING: Setting the rangeCollator to a non-null * collator using this method will cause every single index Term in the * Field referenced by lowerTerm and/or upperTerm to be examined. * Depending on the number of index Terms in this Field, the operation could * be very slow. * * @param rc the collator to use when constructing RangeQuerys */ public void setRangeCollator(Collator rc) { rangeCollator = rc; }
